E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 6/16/1990
Subject: John Smiley healing process
John Smiley is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 7 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Wednesday, 6/18/1990
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Bump Wills



Date: Friday, 6/20/1990
Subject: Progress of Gerald Alexander
Dear Sir,
Gerald Alexander has an ERA of 3.63 at A Frederick Keys!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 6/24/1990
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Scott Holman



Date: Tuesday, 7/8/1990
Subject: Progress of Ken Hill
Dear Sir,
Ken Hill has an ERA of 3.77 at AA Hagerstown Suns!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 7/24/1990
Subject: Jack Howell is sick...
Diagnosis: Sore Back.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take 1-2 weeks.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Monday, 8/18/1990
Subject: Progress of Alan Embree
Dear Sir,
Alan Embree has nothing more to prove at A Frederick Keys!
He has an ERA of 2.32 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director
